html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-06892023-06-23ESDC
ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to (1) increase Canada Student Grants by 40% from pre-pandemic levels for certain students; (2) increase the weekly Canada Student Loans from $210 to $300 for full-time students for the 2023-24 school year; and (3) waive the credit screening requirement for the first-time student financial assistance applicants aged over 22 years.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0157 Publication Date: 2023-07-05
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to (1) increase Canada Student Grants by 40% from pre-pandemic levels for certain students; (2) increase the weekly Canada Student Loans from $210 to $300 for full-time students for the 2023-24 school year; and (3) waive the credit screening requirement for the first-time student financial assistance applicants aged over 22 years.
